name: DEADLOCK
description: Computer networks control everything in the world, therefore evil forces seek to control them. You are an experienced Systems Administrator in charge of a large and powerful network, and you hear disturbing rumors of a shadowy organization, a lunatic hacker, and his digital army.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 3.3 Ghz Intel Core i5-2500k Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: HTC Vive headset required to play
